channel.title: How do I change what you start off with?
channel.description:
I need to change what you start off with when you make a new char, cause right now, you start off with a staff and crap equips...and no money.
How do I make it so you start off with a sword and some decent equips with money?

item.title: How do I change what you start off with?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Anytime. Gl.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I change what you start off with?
item.dc:creator: @Tranquil Tranquil
item.description:
@Tranquil wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:1, topic:193780”]Open Player.java

Search:

craft

Scroll up and you will see something like this:

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1; playerEquipment[playerCape]=-1; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerChest]=-1; playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=-1; playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=-1;

Replace the -1’s with the ID of the item you want the player to wear on that slot.[/quote]

too late

and

i searched
craft

and nothing came up

awch WRONG

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change what you start off with?

item.title: How do I change what you start off with?
item.dc:creator: @Tranquil Tranquil
item.description:
@Tranquil wrote:

Wait 5 seconds

go into player.java

look for

playerEquipment

you should see somthing like

playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1; playerEquipment[playerCape]=1021; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1725; playerEquipment[playerChest]=-1; playerEquipment[playerShield]=1171; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=-1; playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1323;

Edit it to the id of the armor/wepons

Read full topic
